main event: Multiple witnesses reported seeing a silver-colored flying saucer in the sky in Sidney and Maplewood, Ohio, on different occasions in May 1949.
interesting points: The object was described as flat, round, or disc-shaped and was silver in color., Witnesses reported that the object floated high in the sky and appeared to move at a great speed., The sightings occurred over a period from 3 to 6 May 1949., Some observers claimed the object glimmered brightly in the sunlight., Local newspaper articles were published around the same time, possibly influencing the sightings.
witness description: Residents of Sidney and Maplewood, including Mrs. Russell Weibel and unnamed individuals.
